decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: Appendix of Site Photographs, Exsisting Site Block Plan, Existing OS Location Plan, Fire Safety Plan, Planning Statement , Fire Statement, Heritage Statement, Existing OS Site Block Plan, Existing Ground Floor Plan, Existing First Floor Plan, Existing Loft Plan, Existing Roof Plan, Existing Front South West Elevation,  Existing Street Front South West Elevation, Existing Rear North East Elevation, Existing Side North West Elevation, Existing Side South East Elevation, Existing Section A, Existing Section B, Existing Section C, Existing Section D, 
Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Proposed First Floor Plan, Proposed Loft Plan, Proposed Roof Plan, Proposed Front South West Elevation,  Proposed  Street Front South West Elevation, Proposed Rear North East Elevation, Proposed Side North West, Proposed Side South East, Proposed Section A, Proposed Section B, Proposed Section C and  Proposed Section D .


Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension including conversion of existing garage into habitable space.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
